translation.en: No. No, no, no. I know. Shh.
Hello, Mr. Davis.
My name is Jack Carter, and you don't wanna know me.
translation.ko: 잭 카터라고 해 날 만난 걸 후회하게 될 거야

translation.en: I know it's just one guy talking, but I'll be honest.
I don't understand what the big fricking deal is. I don't.
Listen, I told Fletcher I was gonna get him the money.
translation.ko: 인마, 내가 플레처한테 돈 갖다준다고 했거든

translation.en: You shut up.
Give me a break, will you, Jack?
In all honestly, you haven't seen the guy in, what, four, five years? He kicks,
and all of a sudden you give a shit?
Who are you, Father Mulcahy? I'm so not buying this,
translation.ko: 네가 신부님이야? 말이 안 되잖아 웃기지도 않는다고, 친구야

translation.en: it's not even funny, kemo sabe.
translation.ko: 말이 안 되잖아 웃기지도 않는다고, 친구야

translation.en: He was my little brother and he's dead.
He left a wife and kid. So I'm going. I owe him that.
translation.ko: 처자식을 남겨두고 장례식에 가야 할 의무가 있어

translation.en: Let me get this straight. Now you owe him?
Here's the bad news, sports fans: It's a little late.
Well, listen, the therapy session is good,
translation.ko: 상담 잘 받아 치료가 필요한 것 같네

translation.en: you know, because you need it. But why don't I
translation.ko: 상담 잘 받아 치료가 필요한 것 같네 난 딴 데 가 있을 테니까...

translation.en: just go somewhere else? I'm gonna talk to--
translation.ko: 난 딴 데 가 있을 테니까...

translation.en: You sit here and you shut your mouth
or this is going to the next level, you got that?
"Next level"? What is that, a catch phrase or something?
Catch phrase?
Jack, Jack, Jack. Come on. Take it easy. Take it easy.
You're gonna give yourself a fucking heart attack.
Fletcher wants your ass here.
He's made that very clear. He wants you here.
I'm like a broken record. If you don't take care of business,
translation.ko: 고장 난 레코드가 따로 없군 네가 맡은 일을 해

translation.en: the business will take care of you.
translation.ko: 아니면 나중에 후회한다 나중에 땅을 치고 후회해

translation.en: The business will take care of you.
I'm taking care of business. Whatever.
What time's your flight? I'm not flying.
Beg your pardon? Not flying, Connie.
Uh-huh. So would you say you got something special working there?
What are you carrying? Knives, guns, flamethrowers?
Got something you're not telling Con-a-won-a-doo-da-day about?
translation.ko: 대체 뭔데 나한테도 말을 못 해?

translation.en: I'm back in a couple of days.
Right, but... Jack?
What are you doing here?
I came to pay my respects.
He could've used your respect while he was still alive.
Is Doreen around?
Yeah, she's around.
PRIEST: "I will lift up mine eyes unto the hills, from whence cometh my help.
translation.ko: '내가 산을 향하여 눈을 들리라 나의 도움이 어디서 올까'

translation.en: My help cometh from the Lord, which made Heaven and Earth.
He will not suffer thy foot to be moved:
He that keepeth thee will not slumber.
Behold, He that keepeth Israel shall neither slumber nor sleep.
The Lord is thy keeper.
The Lord is thy shade upon thy right hand.
The sun shall not smite thee by day, nor the moon by night.
translation.ko: '낮의 해가 널 상하게 하지 않으며 밤의 달도 해치지 아니하리로다'

translation.en: The Lord shall preserve thee from all evil.
translation.ko: '여호와께서 너를 지켜 모든 환난을 면하게 하시며'

translation.en: He shall preserve thy soul.
The Lord shall preserve thy going out and thy coming in from this day forth
and even for evermore. Amen."
How you doing? I'm Jack, Richie's brother.
Oh, shit, man. Hi, I'm Eddie.
I worked with him over at the George.
Eddie, let me ask you a question.
Was my brother into something?
Richie? No, man.
He wasn't that type of guy.
I'm very sorry about your father.
Don't feel sorry for me.
You don't know me.
You're a picture on a piano.
Hey.
Hold up a second, would you?
I couldn't help noticing you. You stand out in a crowd.
I'm Jack, Richie's brother.
I'm real sorry. He was a great guy.
Yeah.
So, uh, where'd you know Richard from?
Around the bar.
You know how it goes.
No.
Why don't you tell me, how's it go?
Look, I really don't know you well enough to get personal.
JACK: Let me ask you. You think something could've happened
between the last time you saw him and when the accident did happen?
translation.ko: 사고가 있기 전 뭔가 일이 있었다는 거야?

translation.en: EDDIE: I don't know. Maybe, I guess.
JACK: But you would know if something was off, right?
Shit, man, I don't know. I guess. Yeah, maybe.
Jack, that is enough.
It's enough.
What are you gonna do, rough me up?
I'd kind of like to be alone.
Sure.
I'm fine, all right? I just came out for a smoke.
translation.ko: 전 괜찮아요 담배 피우러 나온 거예요

translation.en: You know, Doreen, you don't know me very well,
translation.ko: 도린, 넌 날 잘 몰라 그나마 아는 부분도

translation.en: and what you do know, you don't seem to like very much.
translation.ko: 도린, 넌 날 잘 몰라 그나마 아는 부분도 네 맘엔 안 들겠지

translation.en: I'm gonna be here over the weekend, so if you need anything, anything at all,
translation.ko: 주말에 여기 있을 테니 필요한 것 있으면

translation.en: I'll be staying at the Mercer Hotel, okay?
He didn't drink, you know. What?
My dad.
He wouldn't drink and drive.
So, what do you think happened?
I don't know.
Maybe...
I don't know. Forget it.
He's dead, all right. What's it matter?
Tell my mom I'll be home later.
LES [OVER PHONE]: What'd I tell you? What'd I say?
translation.ko: 내 말 못 들었어? 못 들었어?

translation.en: Which part of "I can't let you go" did you not under-fucking-stand?
translation.ko: 가지 말랬잖아 왜 사람 말을 못 알아들어?

translation.en: This is your job.
This is not a fricking charity case. You do your job.
translation.ko: 난 자선 사업가가 아니라고 해야 할 일을 해

translation.en: Now, I want your butt down here tomorrow.
I am the boss, Jack. Okay?
Got me?
JACK: I can't believe you guys kept this cat.
Richie and I, we used to hide stuff from our mom underneath all the cookies.
translation.ko: 우린 어머니 몰래 쿠키 밑에 뭐든 숨기고는 했죠

translation.en: I'm pretty sure she knew, but I don't think she really cared.
So were you two guys okay?
What? I mean, you and Richie...
I mean, before the accident, were you two getting along okay?
translation.ko: 사고 나기 전에 두 사람 잘 지냈어요?

translation.en: What kind of question is that? Well, it's just a question.
translation.ko: - 무슨 질문이 그래요? - 그냥 묻는 거예요

translation.en: Was he drinking a lot more? More than normal?
Wha--? Jack.
It's just Eddie said he didn't see him drink much.
translation.ko: 에디도 리치가 술은 안 즐겼다고 하고

translation.en: And Doreen said he wouldn't drink and drive.
translation.ko: 도린도 음주 운전할 사람이 아니라고 하니

translation.en: So I'm just wondering-- Oh, Jack. What are you doing?
What? Why do you care all of a sudden?
Because he's dead?
Where were you when he was alive?
He was your brother. You disappeared on him, now he's gone.
translation.ko: 친형인데도 소식 일절 없다가 인제 죽고 나니...

translation.en: So, what am I supposed to do?
Take a trip down memory lane with you?
Catch you up on how he was doing?
What do you think you're gonna do, come in here and fix things?
You don't fix things, Jack.
You break things.
Remember?
Hello, it's Connie. Yeah, it's me.
Jack. What do you say, Jack?
Fucking white of you to call. Fletcher just ripped me a new asshole.
translation.ko: 전화도 다 주고 너 때문에 플레처한테 또 까였어

translation.en: You on your way back? No, I wanna stay a little while.
translation.ko: - 출발했어? - 아니, 여기 좀 더 있을 거야

translation.en: Oh, come on. Who do you think's taking the heat here? We're partners.
translation.ko: 미치겠네, 네가 그러면 불똥이 어디로 튀겠어?

translation.en: Look it up, it'll say, "If you're screwed, I'm screwed."
translation.ko: 내가 네 파트너인데 네가 엿 먹으면 나도 같이 먹어

translation.en: He wants you here. You need a written invitation?
translation.ko: 두목이 오라면 와 - 초대장이라도 기다려? - 할 일이 있어

translation.en: I got some things to do.
Okay. Okay, Jack, here's the truth as I know it.
I don't know how much longer I can cover your ass.
translation.ko: 내가 널 언제까지 감싸줄 수 있을지 모르겠어

translation.en: Are we gonna see Fletcher, or what?
translation.ko: - 플레처 만나러 안 갈 거야? - 갑니다

translation.en: Absolutely. We are flying in. We are there.
translation.ko: - 플레처 만나러 안 갈 거야? - 갑니다 비행기 타고 갈 거예요

translation.en: You got something to say? What do you wanna say?
It's time for you to chop it up with the big dog.
Because I'm hearing talk, Jack. People are talking.
About you and Audrey. I don't know how long I can keep that from him.
translation.ko: 너랑 오드리에 관해서 두목이 물어보면 나도 도리 없어

translation.en: They must be hearing it from you.
Am I right? Oh, you simple bitch.
translation.ko: - 안 그래? - 이 망할 자식 좀 보게

translation.en: I'm covering your ass. Do you hear me?
I'm covering your ass! You better cover your own ass.
translation.ko: - 똥줄이 탄다고! - 내 걱정 하지 말고 너나 잘해

translation.en: Which way is Brumby's office?
No, you listen. I don't wanna hear you can't find it.
This was supposed to be done.
A guy died the other night.
Can you hold on a second?
Can I help you with something? I'm Jack Carter.
translation.ko: 어떻게 오셨죠? 잭 카터입니다, 리치의 형이죠

translation.en: Richie's brother.
I'll call you right back.
Uh, Christ. I'm sorry I wasn't at the funeral,
but I never could take them.
translation.ko: 빌어먹을, 장례식에 못 가서 죄송합니다 그런 일엔 재주가 없죠

translation.en: Would you like some coffee or something?
No, I'm fine, thanks.
He was a good bloke, Richie was.
Saved my ass a lot of money just by doing a solid job.
translation.ko: 일을 야무지게 하니 덕분에 수입이 짭짤했어요

translation.en: So how long was he running this place for you?
Well, since we've been up. About five years.
Five years and no problems? None.
No enemies?
Well, not that I know of. I mean, he was an easygoing sort of bloke.
translation.ko: 제가 알기론 없습니다 성격이 꽤 원만했어요

translation.en: Does he seem like a guy that would get dead drunk
and go out driving in a rainstorm?
Not to me. Me either.
Where is this going?
I think he was taken out.
Taken out?
Richie?
Why would you say that?
There's something you're not telling me, Cliff.
What the hell does that mean? Just relax.
Listen, I don't like hard cases coming in here
and talking to me like I know something.
If there's someone putting out something about me,
translation.ko: 누가 나에 관해 뭐라고 했나 본데

translation.en: I wanna know who it is. When I know what is it
translation.ko: 누군지 말해 누가 뭐라고 했는지 말하라고

translation.en: and who's saying it, I might take the matter up with you.
translation.ko: 누가 뭐라고 했는지 말하라고 그런 다음 널 상대해주지

translation.en: Mightn't I?
You're a big man, but you're out of shape.
With me, it's a full-time job. So please, sit down.
translation.ko: 전문가한테 덤볐다가 피 보지 마시고 그만 앉으세요

translation.en: Thank you.
Now, I know you got security cameras around the bar.
translation.ko: 술집 주변에 감시카메라를 설치하신 것 압니다

translation.en: Did the police ask to look at the tapes?
Why would they? It was drunk driving.
Mind if I do?
That's got the whole night on it.
translation.ko: 그날 밤 영상이 다 들었죠 제럴딘은 만나 보셨어요?

translation.en: Did you talk to Geraldine? Who's Geraldine?
translation.ko: 그날 밤 영상이 다 들었죠 제럴딘은 만나 보셨어요? 제럴딘이 누구죠?

translation.en: Oh, Christ. How am I gonna put this?
She was his, uh, lady on the side. His innamorata.
translation.ko: 리치한텐 여자가 한 명 더 있었죠 애인이 있었어요

translation.en: You know this for sure?
What can I tell you? It wasn't a big thing.
translation.ko: 내가 아는 건 그게 다예요 진지한 관계는 아니었죠

translation.en: Not many people knew about it.
JACK: Cyrus.
How you doing?
Holy shit.
Well, if it ain't the Vegas man with the Vegas tan.
translation.ko: 베이거스 선탠을 하신 베이거스 맨 아니신가

translation.en: Geraldine, right?
Been a long time. Yeah, Jack.
It's been a very long time.
Listen, I heard about Richie, man.
translation.ko: 리치 얘기 들었어, 엿 같은 일이지

translation.en: That's pretty messed up. Yeah.
translation.ko: 리치 얘기 들었어, 엿 같은 일이지 그래

translation.en: You got my deepest condolences and all that shit.
translation.ko: 명복이랑 뭐 그런 거 몽땅 빌어

translation.en: I appreciate that.
So you still running with Fletcher?
Why not? How are you making a living?
Well, I'm making. With who?
With somebody. What do you care? JACK: I don't care.
translation.ko: - 있어, 무슨 상관이야? - 상관 안 해

translation.en: I just wanna know if you're still a bottom-feeder.
Oh, let me tell you something, Jack.
translation.ko: 내 말 잘 들어, 이거 보여?

translation.en: You see all this shit here? You see it?
translation.ko: 내 말 잘 들어, 이거 보여? 보여? 여긴 신세계야

translation.en: This is the new world, brother. I'm online.
translation.ko: 보여? 여긴 신세계야 난 인터넷에서 놀지 우리 애들이야, 내 사업이라고

translation.en: These are my girls, my business.
translation.ko: 난 인터넷에서 놀지 우리 애들이야, 내 사업이라고

translation.en: While you're running around chasing deadbeats for some fucking asshole,
translation.ko: 네가 빌어먹을 놈팡이 대신 빚쟁이들 쫓아다니는 동안

translation.en: I'm swimming in the big pool, baby. I got the juice around here now.
translation.ko: 난 큰 연못에서 헤엄치지 여긴 이제 내 세상이라고

translation.en: I hooked up with this freak and this foreign guy.
Created my own little empire.
Look at you.
The little man versus the start-up.
You got a problem with me?
Let me tell you something, Jack.
I think you should take a very big moment
and just think about where you are.
Because this ain't yesterday, slick.
Relax, I'm just playing with you a little bit.
Oh, yeah, I get that.
Don't put your hands on me.
Come on, let me see your eyes.
Come on.
Whatever turns you on, Jack.
Still pretty? Hm?
Yeah.
Like cat piss in the snow.
translation.ko: 고양이가 눈밭에 오줌 싼 것 같아

translation.en: See you around.
Hey, you can't come-- Hey, you can't come in here.
translation.ko: 여기 들어오면... 여기 들어오면 안 됩니다

translation.en: Hey, mate, where you going?
Is this the part where I'm supposed to be scared?
You Carter?
That's right.
And you really don't wanna know me.
translation.ko: 날 만난 걸 후회하게 될 거야

translation.en: Shit, it's good to be home.
Damn you, Cyrus, I never met the guy.
translation.ko: 사이러스, 처음 보는 남자라니까 놔, 난 모르는 사람이야

translation.en: Get off. I don't know him. Shut up and get in the car.
translation.ko: 사이러스, 처음 보는 남자라니까 놔, 난 모르는 사람이야 닥치고 차에 타

translation.en: Good afternoon, sir. Are you a member? I'm here with Mr. Franklin.
Go right ahead.
GOLFER: Hey, pal, you're walking on my line.
CYRUS: Just smile, sweetheart, and get rid of the guy, okay?
Nice stroke.
Who the fuck are you?
Tiger Woods.
I'm gonna go get security, all right?
Can I help you, sir? I don't know.
Ahem, are you from the club? Is there a problem?
My brother died the other night, and now I'm here.
translation.ko: 요전 날 밤에 동생이 죽어서 이렇게 오게 됐어

translation.en: Listen, uh, Mr-- Carter.
Carter. Mr. Carter. Um...
I'm real sorry about your brother, that sucks.
MAN: Jeremy, what's up? But I can't help you here.
translation.ko: - 제러미, 뭐 해? - 근데 여기서 할 일은 없고

translation.en: So, what I suggest you do is contact my outreach program
over at the offices-- Mind if we talk a minute?
translation.ko: 우리 회사 복지 부서에 연락해... 잠깐 얘기 좀 할까?

translation.en: Uh, yes. Yes, I mind.
I was under the impression this was a private club. Heh.
I think we should go someplace and talk.
Okay, listen, scary man-- I scare you?
Okay, whatever this is, it isn't going over real well, so...
translation.ko: 좋아, 왜 이러는진 몰라도 상당히 불편하니...

translation.en: Why don't you drive me back to my car?
We can talk on the way. Is that a problem?
translation.ko: 내 차까지 데려다주겠어? 가면서 얘기해, 문제 될까?

translation.en: Yeah, it is a problem. No, no. It's a problem if you don't.
translation.ko: - 문제 되지 - 거절하면 문제가 될 거야

translation.en: Come on. It's okay. Come on.
MAN: Jeremy?
So, what's your name? Jeremy Kinnear.
Maybe you've read about me in Forbes.
No, I don't do that, Jeremy. So, what are you telling me, you're bucks-up?
translation.ko: 난 그런 짓 안 해 네가 뭔데? '영앤리치'야?

translation.en: Well, without blowing the proverbial horn
my computer company is worth about a gazillion dollars.
translation.ko: 내 컴퓨터 회사의 가치가 1조 달러쯤 돼

translation.en: Give or take. Your folks must be very proud.
I paid off my student loans, bought them a house in France.
translation.ko: 학자금 대출 다 갚고 프랑스에 집 한 채 사드렸더니

translation.en: They leave me alone.
I think we've got a mutual acquaintance, Jeremy.
JEREMY: Oh, really? Yeah. Cyrus Paice.
Yeah, I know him.
I try not to spend too much time around him though.
What's the connection? I don't see it.
You know, Mr. Carter, I really don't have
translation.ko: 이봐, 카터 난 질문에 대답할 의무 없어

translation.en: to answer your questions.
Sure you do, Jeremy.
What's the connection?
Okay, Mr. Carter, fine.
You know, um...
when you spend most of your life stuck behind a computer
things like golf and girls become pretty important, you know?
But they don't go real well with the glasses
and pocket-protector image my stockholders prefer.
translation.ko: 안경 쓴 찌질이 이미지를 좋아하지 않지

translation.en: So-- So he pulls for you.
You know why I like golf, Mr. Carter?
Because the ball just keeps going away.
The only sport where you hit that little sucker
translation.ko: 그런 스포츠는 또 없어 어디든 보내면

translation.en: and it doesn't come back at you.
I've gotta want to go after it and get it.
And when I get to it...
I just knock it away again.
You see what I'm saying, Mr. Carter?
Once I get rid of it...
I never wanna see it again.
He said his brother died the other night and now he's here.
He's here. You get me? We are fucked.
STAFFER: Excuse me, Mr. Kinnear.
Can you get your feet off the table? Yes, sorry. Sure.
translation.ko: - 발 좀 내려 주시겠습니까? - 그래, 미안해

translation.en: No. No, no. You listen. Listen to me. Listen to me.
You asked me to get you online. I did that for you. Fair trade.
translation.ko: 인터넷에 접속하게 해달래서 줬잖아, 공정한 거래였어

translation.en: Then you start this porn thing. I say, "keep me clean,"
translation.ko: 근데 당신이 포르노를 올리며 내 말은 귓등으로도 안 들었지

translation.en: but you can't do that. I don't wanna think what happens
translation.ko: 내 말은 귓등으로도 안 들었지 놈이 그걸 경찰에 가져갔다면

translation.en: if he's already taken that to the police.
How'd he get it, anyway? They're supposed to go straight to the hard drive. You--
translation.ko: 그게 왜 그자 손에 들어갔지? 하드에 저장했어야지

translation.en: Goddamn right I'm freaking out.
I'm a fucking Harvard grad. I do not do porn.
translation.ko: 난 하버드 출신이야 포르노는 안 한다고

translation.en: No, no, no. Shh, shh, shh, shh!
I don't want to know what happened the other night.
I don't care.
It's none of my business.
I just want the big brother gone.
translation.ko: 다만 그 형이란 자 좀 치워줘

translation.en: I don't mean "gone" like you goned the other guy.
I mean, away. I want him away. I want you away.
translation.ko: 내 눈에 안 띄게 하라고 당신도 그렇고

translation.en: I want the whole thing done.
Hello?
Where's the big bad wolf? Out with the pigs, I guess.
translation.ko: - 나쁜 늑대 어딨어? - 돼지 잡아먹으러 갔겠지

translation.en: He wants you to come back-- Look, Audrey. Listen.
translation.ko: 플레처가 당신... 오드리, 여기 일 끝내고 돌아가면

translation.en: I was thinking that, uh, when I get back, you and me
we gotta get out of Vegas for good, you know.
Jack, I can't do this.
Do what? You and me.
Les Fletcher is my job. It's what I do.
You...
You're...
You're something different.
All right, fine. You ought to get out of there, with or without me
translation.ko: 좋아, 나랑 함께든 아니든 거길 떠나

translation.en: but you ought to get out there. LES: Hey, Audrey.
Audrey! I'm up here.
Get your ass down here. I gotta go.
Yeah, that's good.
Another time, another place, huh?
Yeah.
Bye.
GLORIA: You know, I sometimes feel
I'm gonna be alone for the rest of my life.
I wake up in the morning and look at my little girl
and I wonder when it was we became strangers.
translation.ko: 우리가 언제 낯선 사람이 됐나 싶죠

translation.en: She's all I have now, Jack, and I--
You know, I want her back so bad and I don't even know where she went.
translation.ko: 관계를 회복하고 싶지만 엄두가 안 나요

translation.en: She won't talk to me. She won't even yell at me.
translation.ko: 걘 내게 말도 안 걸고 소리도 안 지르죠

translation.en: Oh, my God.
Who are you? What?
I mean, I'm just trying to make sense of this... of you.
You disappear off the face of the earth
for like five years and then come back and you...
You come back and--
I don't know, you look like Frank Sinatra or something.
And I just can't figure you out.
You know, it's not that big a deal, Gloria.
You know... everything changes, they say.
Why not me?
I just wanna try to do something right. Once.
Yeah, well, what is that, though?
What's right, Jack, you know? You're too late to be Richie's brother.
You can't be Doreen's father.
And you can't be my man.
So I just don't know where you fit.
Maybe I don't.
Maybe I don't.
I'm sorry.
JACK: Eddie.
You know Geraldine. What?
Geraldine. Do you know where she lives?
I don't know, man. The girl that hung around--
The girl that hung around with Richie, do you know where she lives?
A girl? What? Come on.
So you know Doreen much?
Uh, yeah, a little.
Hey, it's right up here on the left.
So, uh, you done with me, man?
No. Sit tight, I'll be right back.
WOMAN [ON TV]: Wouldn't be this great to give to your mother this year?
Oh, yes, of course. Thanks for coming.
Relax, everything is okay. How you doing?
translation.ko: 별일 아니니 놀랄 것 없어, 반가워

translation.en: I'm looking for Geraldine. You know where she is?
What was Richard to you?
You can't just break into my house.
What was he to you?
I told you.
I met him at the bar.
He was just a guy I met.
That's all.
That's all?
He was nicer than most. Did you know he was married?
translation.ko: - 다른 남자들보다 친절했죠 - 유부남인 거 알고 있었어?

translation.en: Look-- Did you know that?
What do you want?
I talked to him, okay? It's not a crime. I gotta be somewhere.
translation.ko: 말을 건 게 죄는 아니잖아요 나가봐야 해요

translation.en: I wanna know what happened.
You don't wanna know.
Geraldine.
Look at me.
Look at me.
I didn't come up here to hurt you.
I just wanna know what happened.
Richie wanted me to leave with him.
He and his wife weren't getting along so well.
Hardly spoke, you know?
They were gonna get divorced.
He wanted me to run away, someplace like New York or something.
I said I couldn't do that, you know?
I got my own life here.
Yeah.
So I went to the bar to say goodbye, and he followed me out.
translation.ko: 그래서 작별하러 술집에 갔는데 날 따라 나와서는

translation.en: And he makes this big scene outside the bar.
I hear he got pretty drunk.
Look, I don't wanna talk about this anymore.
translation.ko: 그날 얘기 더는 하고 싶지 않아요

translation.en: The keys are in it.
THORPEY: Carter.
Looks like the rain must have backed up the sewer.
How you been, man?
Still hanging around here, Thorpey? I like it here.
translation.ko: - 아직도 여기서 서성대, 소피? - 여기가 좋아

translation.en: I gotta have a word with you, all right?
And, uh, confidential.
You just stay in the car. I'll listen. So, what do you wanna tell me?
How you been, man? I mean, you look good.
Thank you. I'm losing sleep here. So, what do you want?
translation.ko: - 어떻게 지냈어? 신수 훤하다 - 고마워 뜸 들이지 말고 말해, 뭐야?

translation.en: Here, take this. It's free.
Alaska Airlines, first class. That's nice.
And who do I have to thank?
I've been asked to make sure you get on that plane. Tonight.
translation.ko: 널 거기 꼭 태우랬어, 오늘 밤에

translation.en: Whatever they're paying you, it ain't gonna be enough.
Hey!
Come on. What you wanna do, boy? Come on, cowboy.
You wanna get rough? Come on. Take your best shot. Come on.
Come on, shoot him.
You got the stuff?
Put the gun down. JACK: Got the balls?
Let's see you do it. Go on.
Put it down. Put it down.
Come on. Come on.
Come on. Come on.
Hey, hey, hey. Come on.
WOMAN: Get back!
MAN: Get down! THORPEY: Out of the way.
Watch out!
Oh, shit.
THORPEY: Okay. Okay.
Fuck.
Come on, the ride's over. Asked me to deliver the ticket
translation.ko: - 나와, 실컷 놀았잖아 - 티켓을 전하랬어 네가 우리 형과 친했잖아

translation.en: because you used to hang around my brother.
I knew you wouldn't go for it. Who sent you?
translation.ko: - 근데 안 먹힐 줄 알았다니까! - 누가 보냈어?

translation.en: I can't tell you. You can't?
Did you have something to do with my brother?
I had nothing to do with your brother.
Then give me a name, or you're history.
Brumby's in the back.
Carter? So now you're a travel agent.
What? That was a real nice touch,
sending Thorpey, very nostalgic.
What the hell are you talking about? What'd Richie have on you?
Bloody hell, Jack. Richie was my friend.
What does it take, a fucking miracle for you to believe that?
You're not giving me anything here.
Oh, Jack, Jack, Jack.
Jack, stop that. Stop it, for fuck's sake.
Look, okay. I owed this bloke some money.
He fronted a truckload last year to extend the club.
translation.ko: 클럽을 확장하느라 한 트럭 미리 끌어다 썼는데

translation.en: He calls me this afternoon, says he'll wipe the slate clean
translation.ko: 아까 오후에 연락이 와선 빚을 탕감해줄 테니

translation.en: if I'll do this thing for him.
He said he wanted you out of town.
That's all. He didn't say how, just out of town.
translation.ko: 그게 다야 여길 떠나게만 해주면 된댔어

translation.en: Your brother was my friend, Jack. I wouldn't hurt him.
translation.ko: 자네 동생은 내 친구였어 친구를 해치진 않아

translation.en: Yeah.
Give me a name or this is going to another level.
translation.ko: 이름을 대, 험한 꼴 당하기 싫으면

translation.en: Cyrus Paice.
JACK: You want me out?! Huh? You want me out?!
You wanna do this? You wanna do this?
Rabbit's out of the hat. Let's see if it jumps.
What'd you do to Richie? Damn you! I didn't do nothing.
translation.ko: - 리치를 어떡한 거야? - 제기랄, 난 아무 짓 안 했어!

translation.en: I hate to be the bearer of bad news, but you're chasing your ass.
translation.ko: 이런 말 하긴 싫지만 다 네 탓이야

translation.en: You were gone too long, brother. Shit changes.
translation.ko: 관심조차 안 줬잖아 그러니 변할 수밖에

translation.en: Maybe not you, but some shit does change.
You brother, your precious brother, Richie, was no goddamn saint.
translation.ko: 네 소중한 동생 리치도 결코 성자는 아니었거든

translation.en: Everybody's into something. Plain and simple, all right?
There's no mystery, no intrigue.
He got juiced up one night. He got oiled up
translation.ko: 어느 날 술 처먹고 해롱대며 나무를 들이받은 게 다야

translation.en: and he wrapped his sorry ass around a tree.
End of story.
Now, if you wanna do this little dance here
translation.ko: 이 미친 짓을 하겠다면 옛정을 생각해서

translation.en: for old time's sake, Jack, bring it.
translation.ko: 이 미친 짓을 하겠다면 옛정을 생각해서 받아줄게

translation.en: Let me tell you something, you're gonna end up
like a one-legged man in an ass-kicking contest.
translation.ko: 근데 그래 봤자 망신당하는 건 바로 너야

translation.en: I'm tired of your bullshit, Jack. I'm a businessman.
I got ladies waiting for me on the inside.
Grow up, Jack.
DOREEN: Uncle Jack.
I didn't think you were gonna show up.
I was in the neighborhood, you know?
Listen, I'm having one of those year-long nights.
I don't know if I'd be fun to be around.
Maybe we ought to take a rain check on this.
Okay?
Okay. All right.
Bye. I'll give you a call tomorrow.
Doreen.
You hungry?
A little.
You drink coffee? Mm, yeah.
I smoke too.
I don't know if that's worth bragging about, do you?
You smoke.
Well, I did. But I just recently quit.
Oh, yeah? When?
Oh, I'd say about...
now.
So if you don't mind.
Makes you nuts, doesn't it?
It's having an impact, yes.
You are so freaky.
Well, we're all a little freaky, Doreen.
It's those straight ones we gotta worry about.
So, what do you do, like, for work?
What'd your father tell you? He didn't.
translation.ko: - 아빠가 뭐라고 했니? - 아무 말 안 했어요

translation.en: That's good.
Mom said you were a gambler.
Isn't that illegal?
Are you a bookie?
Bookie? No. More like, um...
More like a financial adjuster.
So you ever been to prison?
For how long? How about this weather?
Come on.
What do you say we change the subject?
All right. Fine.
You ever shoot anybody?
You wanna know what I do for a living?
Simple. People make promises and they break them.
translation.ko: 간단해, 약속을 안 지키는 사람들이 있지

translation.en: My job is to refresh their memory.
That's about it. No big deal.
What's with the clothes?
What's with the jewelry in your face?
Heh. You don't like it?
It's nice. Heh.
You ever been married?
I don't think so.
So you don't have a family of your own.
What are you?
DOREEN: Why'd you leave?
JACK: Well, Doreen, that's a long, long story.
DOREEN: It's a long, long ride.
Let's put it this way.
You ever wanna take every mirror in the world and get rid of it
translation.ko: 세상에 있는 거울을 다 없애버리고 싶었던 적 있어?

translation.en: because you didn't like what was coming back at you?
translation.ko: 네 모습이 맘에 안 들어서 말이야

translation.en: Yeah.
I wish my dad was here.
Me too.
Do you, um...?
Do you really think somebody killed him?
Yeah, I think so, but...
Me too.
So do you have a license yet? Yep.
What, did you, like, learn that in school?
Dad taught me. Oh, yeah?
Doreen, would you wait in the car?
Why? Why? It's all right.
Wait in the car. I'll be right back. It's okay. It's okay.
RECORDED VOICE [OVER PHONE]: If you'd like to make a call, please hang up and try again.
translation.ko: 전화하기 원하시면 끊었다가 다시 걸어 주세요

translation.en: If you need help, hang up and then dial the operator.
GLORIA: Jack.
You all right? Have you seen Doreen?
What happened? Who did it? I have no idea where she is.
translation.ko: - 어떻게 된 거죠? - 걔 행방을 모르겠어요 - 누구 짓이에요? - 모르겠어요, 그냥 와선...

translation.en: He came-- I don't know. He came in. I...
Are you okay? You all right? It's gonna be all right.
Really.
Why'd they do this? I don't know.
translation.ko: - 왜 이런 짓을 한 거죠? - 모르겠어

translation.en: But I'm gonna find out, you can believe that.
Come on, let's go get your mom. Where are we going?
I want you guys to stay with me tonight, okay?
Gloria, why don't we get out of here?
Yeah. I'm fine. I'm okay.
I need to talk to your Uncle Jack alone.
JACK: What's wrong?
GLORIA: I need you to leave. JACK: What?
My mom's coming over. We're gonna go to her place tonight.
translation.ko: 엄마가 곧 올 거예요 당분간 친정에서 지내기로 했어요

translation.en: We're gonna stay there. Listen, I know that you wanna help.
translation.ko: 엄마가 곧 올 거예요 당분간 친정에서 지내기로 했어요 돕고 싶은 마음은 이해하는데

translation.en: But just look around you.
Look what you brought into my house. Look at my face.
translation.ko: 당신 때문에 내 집이 이 꼴이 됐죠 내 얼굴을 봐요

translation.en: Look at my family. You're not helping, Jack.
translation.ko: 내 가족을요 도움이 안 되고 있어요

translation.en: So please go.
Wait. What are you say--? I brought in--?
I didn't bring anything into this--
Gloria. Look, I just wanna know the truth.
translation.ko: 이게 왜 나 때문에... 글로리아 사실대로 말해줘요 리치한테 무슨 일이 있었던 거죠?

translation.en: What the hell was Richie into?
translation.ko: 사실대로 말해줘요 리치한테 무슨 일이 있었던 거죠?

translation.en: Oh, God.
Okay.
Oh, my head hurts. That's all right.
Whatever this costs, I'll just take care of it, all right?
I think maybe you and Doreen wanna get out of town.
Take a vacation. I'll take care of that too.
You shouldn't be here. Just-- We're fine. We're fine.
translation.ko: 여기 있어선 안 돼요 우린 괜찮으니까

translation.en: Just go.
I'm sorry, Gloria.
Hey.
I snuck out.
Took a cab.
Grandma's house smells funny.
Do you wanna come in?
Nice tattoos.
I'll bring her by in the morning. Yeah, I promise.
All right. Good night.
Your mother is a little upset.
It was your idea to call her.
Ah, listen, I don't mind.
She cares about you, she loves you. That's...
That's pretty special. Listen, you got one mother, right?
translation.ko: 그건 특별한 거야 세상에 엄마는 단 하나니까

translation.en: It's a real scary place out there, so I don't blame her.
You must be a little tired.
I'll tell you what, why don't you take the bed?
I got a lot of work to do in the other room, and, uh...
I'll take you home in the morning, okay?
It's gonna be all right, really.
I was coming for you.
Bet you didn't know you had a fairy godmother, Jack.
translation.ko: 당신한테 요정 할머니가 있는 거 몰랐죠?

translation.en: You gave my brother a disc. What was on it?
A fairy godmother all of your own.
Don't play me, Geraldine, all right? No more games.
No more dress up, you understand?
You gave my brother a disc.
What was on it?
I don't know what you're-- No.
I'll tell you something. If you lie,
I'm gonna break every-- Listen to me.
translation.ko: 계속 거짓말하면 당신의 그 예쁜... 잘 들어

translation.en: I'm gonna break every beautiful bone in your body.
translation.ko: 당신 몸에 있는 예쁜 뼈를 하나씩 부러트릴 거야

translation.en: I'm not lying to you.
I'm just here because he wanted to see you.
Who?
The Demon King.
He wanted to speak to you, so he made some calls
translation.ko: 당신과 할 말이 있대요 전화 몇 통 하고

translation.en: and he waved his magic wand and... poof!
Shit.
Sorry.
Hell of a day you had, huh, Mr. Carter?
Sorry to get you up so early.
Personally, I hate mornings.
Where you going?
Uh, she's done her job.
translation.ko: 어디 가? 얜 할 일 다 했어 우리 얘기 들을 필요 없어

translation.en: She doesn't need to hear this.
translation.ko: 얜 할 일 다 했어 우리 얘기 들을 필요 없어

translation.en: Oh, don't worry about Jimmy. He's, um... He's more here for decoration.
Hey, you want a cappuccino or something? He makes a really mean froth.
translation.ko: 카푸치노 마실래? 지미가 거품을 끝내주게 만들어

translation.en: I use nonfat milk.
Thanks, but I'm lactose intolerant.
What?
Um, Jimmy, could you show our friend down to her car?
translation.ko: 지미, 우리 친구 좀 차까지 데려다줄래?

translation.en: Thanks.
Cute guy. You think?
No.
I had my 30th birthday last month.
I'm worth about $900 million.
I'm in Newsweek and Forbes in the same fucking month.
I'm the all-powerful ruler of time and space, Mr. Carter.
And your friend Cyrus...
the porn guy...
he's coming to me with threats of going public.
Messing up my image.
Okay, awkward moment.
Look, I've never really done this before, but, um...
I figure you probably have...
so here goes.
I understand there was quite a fuss the other night over at the George.
MAN: Where's the disc, man?
JEREMY: Everybody was shitting bricks, especially Cyrus.
translation.ko: 다들 조바심을 내고 있었지 특히 사이러스가

translation.en: Your brother Richard's name was mentioned.
Cyrus goes out with some very bad guys...
and when he comes back...
your brother's gone.
You see what I'm saying, Mr. Carter?
I think we both want the same thing.
translation.ko: 우리 둘 다 원하는 게 같아

translation.en: Who do you think you're fucking with?
Come on, come on.
Yeah? LES: Where are you?
What do you want? What do I want? What do I fucking want?
translation.ko: - 무슨 일이죠? - 무슨 일? 무슨 일이냐고?

translation.en: Talk.
I said, talk. Jack.
LES: Tell him. Tell him.
Con tells me you're doing my woman behind my back.
translation.ko: 코니 말이 네가 내 여자랑 잔다는 거야

translation.en: Now tell me Con's lying. Tell me that, Jack.
He is lying. Is your name Jack?
translation.ko: 거짓말이라니까요 네가 잭이야? 난 얘 사랑해, 죽일까 생각 중이야

translation.en: I love this woman. I'm thinking about killing her.
translation.ko: 네가 잭이야? 난 얘 사랑해, 죽일까 생각 중이야

translation.en: You don't wanna know what I'm thinking about doing to you.
translation.ko: 난 널 좋아하지도 않아 내가 널 어쩔 건지 알면 후회할걸

translation.en: You're a real tough guy on the phone.
Audrey, you gotta get out of there. Go. He won't touch you.
translation.ko: 오드리, 떠나 플레처는 당신한테 손 못 대

translation.en: LES: Oh, I won't touch her, huh? I won't touch her?
Jack, please, listen-- If you don't fucking shut up...
I'm telling you, Carter, I'm two seconds away
translation.ko: 잘 들어, 카터 이 계집은 맞아야 정신 차려

translation.en: from fucking pasting this broad.
Get your ass back in town tonight,
translation.ko: 오늘 밤 안으로 안 돌아오면 두 사람 모두...

translation.en: or you're both gonna be-- You lay a hand on her,
translation.ko: 오늘 밤 안으로 안 돌아오면 두 사람 모두... 오드리한테 손대면

translation.en: and I swear to Christ I will come there and bury you alive.
translation.ko: 내가 널 생매장할 테니 그리 알아

translation.en: When I finish with you, you're gonna wish I killed you.
translation.ko: 너야말로 제발 죽여달라고 빌게 해줄 테니 그리 알아

translation.en: Audrey, what do you wanna do? I'm here for you.
LES: Jack, are you fucking pathetic?
Go ahead, tell him, Audrey. What do you wanna do?
Audrey, what do you wanna--? What do you wanna do?
LES: You listening, lover boy? Yeah.
You getting it?
Les, listen to me. I'm out of Vegas, understand? It ends here.
translation.ko: 레스, 난 안 돌아가, 우린 끝났어

translation.en: Fuck you. It ends when I say it ends, you cocksucker.
translation.ko: 엿 먹어, 끝나고 안 끝나고는 내가 결정해

translation.en: EDDIE: Come on, baby, get in there.
Yeah, get that fine booty in there. What's up?
You got some-- Check out her tongue.
translation.ko: 여기 뭐가... 얘 혀 좀 봐

translation.en: EDDIE: Showtime.
We're taking you to a party.
Come on, it'll be fun.
EDDIE: Yeah, baby, that's it.
Just relax.
Don't you want me?
Suck it.
DOREEN: No.
Come to Daddy.
Yeah, ha-ha-ha!
DOREEN: I need to leave. I need to leave.
It's okay. It's cool.
DOREEN: No.
Jack, what do you say, Jack?
You pick me a winner today, huh?
Did you come up with a sure thing?
It's a bad time, Con.
Boy, you're telling me. You remember Peter, don't you?
CON: Jack! Jack! No.
No, Jack.
Say, Jack, when I said,
translation.ko: 말해봐, 잭 맡은 일 안 하면

translation.en: "You take care of the business
or the business will take care of you,"
did we have a bad connection on the cell?
Maybe you weren't listening?
Fuck it. It don't matter, does it?
Hey, sport, I was real sorry to hear about you and Audrey.
What are you gonna do? He's the big dog. There's no way around that.
He gets the girl, Jack.
You get what you get.
Jack!
Doreen?
Hey. Hey.
I saw that.
DOREEN: Caught.
What happened to your face?
Couple of guys jumped me on the elevator on the way up.
Really?
No, I...
I-- I slipped, you know?
It happens sometimes when you get older, you know?
Your ticket for your Mustang, you know.
I got it downstairs.
You probably should be getting back now.
What are you gonna do?
Well, you know, I'm gonna be taking off today.
Why? Well...
It just worked out that way.
For good?
For a while.
Doreen, before I go, I just...
I just wanna tell you I think you're a special girl.
translation.ko: 해주고 싶은 말이 있는데 넌 특별한 애야

translation.en: I mean that.
And in these 48 hours...
I could see that.
Things happen to us, Doreen, you know? We...
We make mistakes. We...
We fall down...
and we get into trouble. It happens to everybody. It does.
But it doesn't mean, you know,
everything that happened yesterday has to happen every day. It doesn't.
translation.ko: 어제 일이 매일 있는 건 아니야 그렇지 않거든

translation.en: I mean, you don't wanna do it like me
and spend your whole life looking backwards.
You know, it is what it is. We can't change our history.
translation.ko: 이미 벌어진 일을 바꿀 순 없어

translation.en: We can't do that, I mean...
But you can go past it.
Just right past it.
And, you know, up ahead,
it's all new, you know? It's...
It's new. It's yours if you want it.
translation.ko: 원하면 네 것이 될 수 있어

translation.en: I gotta tell you, your mother loves you.
No matter what you think, she loves you.
Maybe you got things you have to talk to her about
or some problems, whatever.
You should talk to her. She'll listen.
You know...
I don't know what happened.
He, uh...
He worked with dad. He was always really nice.
I thought I, um...
I thought...
I mean...
I thought it was gonna be cool.
Fun, you know?
We, uh...
We had some...
We had some champagne and, uh, he asked if I...
wanted to go to this party.
You should have seen my friends' faces.
I don't even remember what happened.
translation.ko: 무슨 일이 있었는지조차 기억 안 나요

translation.en: I just remember...
not being able to move much.
I remember, um...
wanting to leave.
Wanting it to stop.
Wanting to...
go home.
It's all my fault. No.
It's not your fault.
None of this is your fault.
You gotta believe that.
No, no, no.
None of this is your fault. None of it.
Yeah. GERALDINE: Jack?
Who is this? It's Geraldine.
Look, I didn't know she was Richie's daughter.
When I found out who she was, I got the disc to Richie right away.
I didn't know what he'd do with it.
He went to them and said he was taking the disc to the cops.
Cyrus knows I gave him the disc.
translation.ko: 내가 디스크 준 걸 사이러스가 알고는

translation.en: He's on his way here. He's coming over now, Jack.
translation.ko: 이리로 오고 있어요 지금 오고 있다고요

translation.en: I didn't know who to call. I was just...
Shit. I'm sorry.
I'm so sorry.
JACK: Where's Eddie? He's not working today.
translation.ko: - 에디 어딨어? - 오늘 일 안 해

translation.en: Where's he live? What's going on?
Where's he live? Jack. Jack. Jack.
Will you listen to me? For just a minute.
I've been in it all my life, on both sides of the ocean.
translation.ko: 평생 양쪽 대륙에서 이 일에 몸담아

translation.en: And I'm telling you this. If you get mixed up
translation.ko: 내가 잘 아는데 자네 동생이 왜 그렇게 됐든 똑같이 엮었다간

translation.en: in whatever it was your brother was into
translation.ko: 자네 동생이 왜 그렇게 됐든 똑같이 엮었다간

translation.en: you got a pretty good chance of winding up exactly the same as he did.
And those two ladies are gonna have to go into mourning all over again.
translation.ko: 그럼 글로리아와 도린은 다시 상복을 입어야겠지

translation.en: Now, I can't tell you what to do, but I can tell you this:
Getting yourself killed won't bring Richie back.
Revenge doesn't work.
Sure it does.
They knew what they were fucking getting into.
JACK: Don't play me!
It was Cyrus' deal, man.
He probably killed your brother, all right?
It wasn't fucking me!
He's at a fucking party right now at some fucking fencing club or something,
translation.ko: 지금 펜싱 클럽인지 뭔지에서 파티하고 있어요

translation.en: with Kinnear, all right?
I was just fucking playing-- I was just playing around.
translation.ko: 난 그냥 재미 좀 본 것뿐이라고요

translation.en: Go get them. I don't--
I'm having a real hard time understanding something, Eddie.
What could she have done to you that was so bad that you'd wanna do this to her, hm?
translation.ko: 도린이 무슨 잘못을 했길래 그런 짓을 한 거지?

translation.en: Because what you did doesn't go away.
She trusted you.
And you raped her.
She was my brother's daughter. My family.
translation.ko: 걘 내 동생 딸이야, 내 가족이라고

translation.en: And it's my fault.
Because if I had been here, this never would have gone down.
translation.ko: 내가 고향을 안 떠났다면 이런 일은 없었을 테니까

translation.en: So now I gotta make it right. I gotta do that.
I mean, what would you do if it was your daughter?
Jack, don't kill me, man.
You killed yourself.
CON: Jack, stop!
Hey! Hey!
Jack!
Get him! Go, go, go!
Jack!
Jack, stop!
Goddamn it!
Motherfucker.
Oh, fuck!
CON: Don't lose him.
Stay on him.
You're dead!
Just get on him.
You cocksucker!
Come on, come on, come on.
Drive, drive, drive!
Where is he?
Oh, man. Jack!
There you go.
Don't turn.
Is this what you want?
Oh, shit.
PEDESTRIAN: Yeah? All right with me.
Sorry, Mr. Carter. You're not on the list.
Nobody likes the list guy.
Hey.
Can I help you with something?
I don't think so.
Jeremy Kinnear.
Look, Mr. Phone Guy, do you have any idea who I am?
translation.ko: 이봐, 전화 받은 양반 내가 누군지나 알아?

translation.en: I'm gonna buy your goddamn hotel so I can fire you.
I wanna talk to Mr. Fletcher. Les Fletcher.
No, you listen to me, you neophyte toady. I am in the middle of a party here.
translation.ko: 잘 들어, 애송이 나 지금 파티 중이야!

translation.en: I should not be having to deal with this. Now, put me through to your boss.
translation.ko: 이러고 있을 틈 없다고 당장 전화 바꿔!

translation.en: Listen, why don't you girls go in the back room, and I'll...
I'll meet you back there in a minute.
I got some things to take care of.
Did you know who she was?
Excuse me? Did you knew she was my blood?
Jack, are we gonna go through this goddamn little dance again?
translation.ko: 잭, 이 미친 춤을 또 추자는 거야?

translation.en: Huh? Go ahead. Take out your gun, Jack.
Take out your gun in front of all these people here.
Put one right between my eyes.
I don't think you could handle jail the rest of your life.
I wanna tell you something, slick.
The man you want
is that little piss-ass Kinnear.
Him and the old guy. So stop breaking my balls, all right?
translation.ko: 쟤랑 늙은이 말이야 그러니 나 좀 그만 괴롭혀

translation.en: I'm a goddamn businessman just trying to stay afloat, just like you.
translation.ko: 난 그냥 너처럼 성실한 사업가일 뿐이라고

translation.en: You're nothing like me.
Excuse me, wait a minute, Jack. All of a sudden you care?
All of a sudden, what are you, some kind of fucking good guy, hm?
Hey, you're the bad brother, remember? I know who I am. Heh.
translation.ko: - 넌 나쁜 형인 거 잊었어? - 난 분수를 알지

translation.en: Well, Jack, listen, I would love to sit here and jaw with you
translation.ko: 잭, 나도 너랑 이빨 까고 싶지만

translation.en: but I gotta get back to the talent, so...
Hey, uh, Jack...
let it go.
Come on, Jack, let's see what you got.
Hey, hey. Hey, Jack, come on.
Come on. Come on.
Goddamn, Jack.
Your little brother put up a better fight than you did.
MAN: Come on!
You should finish what you start.
Yeah. Hey, you should fix your tie a little bit there.
Have a good time.
MAN: Where is it, Richie?
JACK: You got a car?
Let's take a ride.
Where are we going, Mr. Carter?
Hey. Hey, slow down. Turn the lights back on, please.
Come on, shut the door. It's not my problem.
translation.ko: - 서둘러, 문 닫아 - 내 문제가 아니야

translation.en: I didn't do it.
Will you slow down, please? You're gonna kill us.
Please!
Okay, okay. What do you want? You want a clean slate?
translation.ko: 좋아, 원하는 게 뭐야? 경력 세탁?

translation.en: Just give me five minutes in front of a laptop.
Slow down! You're gonna kill us! That's the point, Jeremy.
translation.ko: - 속도 줄여, 이러다 죽겠어! - 바로 그거야

translation.en: Okay. You want money?
Just name your price. I've got more money than God.
You need a drink.
It's okay.
It's all right, Jeremy.
Is this how you did it to Richie, huh?
This how you did it, Jeremy, huh?
You think he screamed too? You like it?
translation.ko: 리치도 비명 질렀어? - 맘에 들어? - 동생을 죽인 건 내가 아니야!

translation.en: I didn't kill your brother, Mr. Carter.
translation.ko: - 맘에 들어? - 동생을 죽인 건 내가 아니야!

translation.en: JACK: Get up. JEREMY: Mr. Carter.
You're making a mistake. Get up. Move.
Listen to me, you're making a mistake here.
Cyrus told me your brother was gonna go to the police with his disc.
translation.ko: 사이러스가 와서는 당신 동생이 경찰에 신고한댔다며

translation.en: And he said if he went down, I'd go down, okay?
translation.ko: 사이러스가 와서는 당신 동생이 경찰에 신고한댔다며 자기가 망하면 나도 망한댔어

translation.en: Please... I didn't know what to do, Mr. Carter.
So you had him killed. No, No, no.
I just said to him to get the disc back, that's all.
I had nothing to do with it. I just told Cyrus to get the disc.
translation.ko: 진짜야, 난 관련 없어 디스크만 찾아오라고 했다니까

translation.en: I told him to get the disc,
and that our business together would be over.
That's all. Mr. Carter, I swear to you.
I swear to you, I didn't do anything.
translation.ko: 진짜야, 난 아무 짓도 안 했어!

translation.en: I didn't kill him, Mr. Carter. Please believe me.
He said if I said anything
he would ruin me.
And then you came--
You came along and--
Please, Mr. Carter. Please, it was Cyrus.
He killed your brother and Geraldine, not me.
translation.ko: 놈이 당신 동생과 제럴딘을 죽였어 내가 그런 게 아니야

translation.en: He said he was working with some guy.
It was them. They did it. No more talk.
Turn around.
Please, no, no, no. Turn around. Oh, shit...
Be a man for once in your life.
I'm gonna do something for you...
nobody ever did for me.
I'm gonna give you a second chance.
translation.ko: 네게 두 번째 기회를 줄 거야

translation.en: Please don't make me come back.
No.
I won't, Mr. Carter. Thank you.
Thank you. Thank you so much.
I promise I won't make you come back.
Thank you.
JACK: Hey.
Hey. What are you doing?
Sorry, Jack. I don't usually get my hands dirty,
translation.ko: 미안해, 잭 보통은 내 손을 더럽히지 않는데 자네 방을 뒤졌지만

translation.en: but I checked your room and there was nothing there, so...
translation.ko: 보통은 내 손을 더럽히지 않는데 자네 방을 뒤졌지만 아무것도 없더라고, 그래서...

translation.en: Listen, about this, uh, Doreen thing.
She'll be all right, I think.
Kids are resilient, you know?
And, uh, this thing with Richie, I mean, Christ, that was bloody awful.
I don't know what Cyrus was thinking, but, heh, a man's got to make a living.
I tried to keep you out of it, but you insisted
on this post facto big-brother thing.
translation.ko: 인제 와서 형 노릇 하겠다는데 도리가 없더라고

translation.en: So I figured if I left enough dangling,
you would find my disc for me.
What a mess, eh?
All over a shiny piece of plastic.
Listen.
I'll get rid of the disc,
you seem to have gotten rid of everything else, so...
translation.ko: 다른 건 자네가 모두 없앤 것 같으니...

translation.en: You may have hardware concealed about your person.
translation.ko: 자네 사람은 감쪽같이 없앨 수 있을지 몰라도

translation.en: But remember:
You kill me, you'll be on the run for the rest of your life.
It's been nice knowing you, Jack.
JACK: Brumby.
I'm not turning round.
Suit yourself.
Uncle Jack.
JACK: Your mother told me I'd find you here.
I thought you were gone. I am gone. I just wanted to come by
translation.ko: - 떠나신 줄 알았어요 - 떠나는 길에 들렀어

translation.en: and say goodbye to you, face-to-face.
What, uh...? What happened to your beard thing? Oh, that?
Well, I thought it would be time for a change.
I just got rid of it.
Did you fall again?
This?
Yeah, I did, I fell down. I gotta...
get new shoes.
We're gonna be okay, you know?
Mom and me.
I know.
Thanks for being here. It would've meant a lot to Dad, you know?
translation.ko: 와 주셔서 고마워요 아빠가 무척 반가웠을 거예요

translation.en: He was a good man. Yeah.
Guess you gotta go, huh?
Yeah.
Do you remember when I said you're special?
You better remember that or you're gonna have a big problem with me, okay?
Okay.
Take care of yourself, Doreen.
You too.
Hey.
I like the new look.
Yeah.
